ai-patthana15.32:0.2_0: Living in the teaching, they are included in the discourses and found, as it’s amazing.
ai-patthana15.32:1.1_0: Understanding that thought is skillful, not unskillful.
ai-patthana15.32:1.1_1: ‘... for the sake of one day.’ ...
ai-patthana15.32:2.1_0: Lefit defilements don’t arise because of defilement, the unskillful is not skillful.
ai-patthana15.32:2.1_1: ‘... for the sake of the three realms.’ ...
ai-patthana15.32:3.1_0: not having declared the following qualities.
ai-patthana15.32:3.1_1: ‘... for the sake of the three realms.’ ...
